CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL( Health_Status__c , "Green")), IMAGE( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=00P50000005vPYv", "Green: Good"), IF (AND(ISPICKVAL(Health_Status__c , "Yellow")), IMAGE( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=00P50000005vPZ5", "Amber: Warning"), IF (AND(ISPICKVAL(Health_Status__c , "Red")), IMAGE( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=00P50000005vPZ0", "Red: Critical"),null)))
CustomField.label: Health Status
